## AdvancedTableBodyContentRendererComponent.rowClick() method

Handles click to row

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rowClick(data: TData, index: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | <code>TData</code> | Data of row that was clicked |
|  index | <code>number</code> | Index of clicked row |
